categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Skirmish on Tatooine was a skirmish between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire that occurred during the Galactic Civil War.

After escaping an Imperial attack, two rebel soldiers landed on Tatooine via escape pods near a Tusken Raider camp. The Galactic Empire then dispatched AT-STs, stormtroopers, scout troopers, shadow troopers, Demolition Troopers, and Imperial shock troopers to engage them, while Admiral Gial Ackbar arrived in an MC80 Star Cruiser and engaged the Imperial-class Star Destroyer.

Eventually, Imperial ground forces were defeated, and a group of T-65B X-wing starfighters flew down and proceeded to attack the fleeing stormtroopers, while the Star Destroyer crashed down onto the planet.
Part of the Skirmish on Tatooine was one of the Survival Missions for Star Wars Battlefront.
